message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the problem of visual hashtag discovery for infographics, which involves extracting visual elements from an infographic that are diagnostic of its topic. This problem is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV) as it involves analyzing and processing visual elements. Additionally, the paper also involves text extraction and prediction, which falls under information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of machine learning algorithms for tag prediction and localization also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories.
